ygData.subject: Re: A few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dual weild is always higher then all skills it also depends on how many practices you put into it ... Yes Safe Fall works automatically as you fall more
ygData.messageBody:
> 1. Does dual weild has level cap? It seems that my dual wield is more
> than 25 when I'm just only level 4.

Dual weild is always higher then all skills it also depends on how many
practices you put into it

> 2. How does safe fall work? Is it automatic?

Yes Safe Fall works automatically as you fall more and more you will see it
go up and as time goes on falls that would have hurt will no longer hurt or
you will take much less damage.

> 3. What is the best glove I can get now to hit magical?

Level 4 you say. Try and get some netted in Qeynos sewers if you are over
there in a few more levels. Or save your pennies and buy some woven or Mesh.

Hope this all helps

Heldenfeld
